DOC.brief_title: Serum Exhaled Breath Condensate MALDI-MS Lung Cancer . ( SPORE )
DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : - To evaluate ability proteomic pattern serum exhale breath condensate sample detect discriminate lung cancer healthy high-risk individual . - To correlate proteomic pattern tumor behavior . OUTLINE : This multicenter study . Blood exhale breath condensate sample collect , whenever possible , time medically indicated purpose ( e.g. , work-up , pre-op , surgical procedure ) . The sample use produce genetic material ( i.e. , DNA , RNA ) molecular material ( i.e. , protein ) store future study , include study may relate lung cancer . Future genetic study relate lung cancer may include study protein expression pattern via matrix-assisted laser desorption/ionization time flight mass spectrometry may serve predictive molecular marker lung cancer . Participants complete 15-minute Lung Spore Database questionnaire time study enrollment provide information demographic ( e.g. , date birth , address , phone number ) , medical smoking history , personal family history cancer cancer treatment , current medication . Medical record review time study enrollment approximately 5 year obtain information , include test result , associated diagnosis cancer . Participants may also contact phone late time answer question health status .
DOC.criteria: DISEASE CHARACTERISTICS : Meets 1 follow criterion : Normal healthy volunteer At high risk lung cancer ( e.g. , > 30pack year history smoking ; chronic obstructive pulmonary disease ; diseasefree surgical resection lung cancer ) Diagnosis stage I , II , IIIA , IIIB , IV lung cancer Must willing allow blood exhale breath condensate sample store genetic test PATIENT CHARACTERISTICS : Not specify PRIOR CONCURRENT THERAPY : Not specify
